Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People in Australia are waiting anxiously for the upcoming Federal budget as they continue to face rising costs of living. The Australian Medical Association is calling for a sugar tax to reduce the consumption of sugary drinks while student accommodation pioneers Craig Carracher and Stephen Gaitanos have launched a $1 billion-plus build-to-rent fund for rental housing. Additionally farmers and the government have been given until November to mediate a potential $1.2bn settlement in the class action brought against the 2011 live cattle export ban.
